KCB Bank Tanzania Limited, nke a na-akpọkwa KCB Bank Tanzaniya, bụ ụlọ akụ azụmahịa dị na Tanzania

Ọ Ọ bụ otu n'ime ụlọ akụ iri abụọ na itoolu (29) nyere ikike nke Bank of Tanzania, onye na-ahụ maka ụlọ akụ nke obodo ahụ. Ụlọ akụ ahụ bụ onye otu Kenya Commercial Bank Group (KCB Group), nke nwere isi na Nairobi, Kenya, yana ụlọ ọrụ enyemaka na Kenya, Rwanda, South Sudan, Tanzania na Uganda.
